titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the Commissioners of both kingdomes, the same day they delivered the propositions to the Kings Maiesty, for a safe and well-grounded peace. / By Samuel Kem, Batchelour in Divinity.
titleStmt.author: Kem, Samuel, 1604-1670.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
